text.name: cb_enableContractValueOverrides_long
text.text: Enables overriding contract system default setting values. Disables the next four settings if set to false.

text.name: cb_rewardFactor_long
text.text: Multiplies all contract rewards with the given factor.

text.name: cb_maxContractsPerFarm_long
text.text: Defines the maximum number of contracts each farm may have active at any given time.

text.name: cb_maxContractsPerType_long
text.text: Defines the maximum number of contracts of the same type which may be offered to you.

text.name: cb_maxContractsOverall_long
text.text: Defines the maximum number of contracts which can be offered to you.

text.name: cb_enableStrawFromHarvestMissions_long
text.text: Allows collecting straw from harvest contracts.

text.name: cb_enableSwathingForHarvestMissions_long
text.text: Allows using a swather for harvest contracts.

text.name: cb_enableGrassFromMowingMissions_long
text.text: Allows collecting straw from mowing contracts.

text.name: cb_enableStonePickingFromMissions_long
text.text: Allows collecting stones from tillage and sowing contracts.

text.name: cb_enableFieldworkToolFillItems_long
text.text: Adds free items to fill your tools when borrowing equipment for a contract.

text.name: cb_baleMissionReward_long
text.text: The base reward for baling contracts. If set to '-', the base game rewards will be applied.

text.name: cb_baleWrapMissionReward_long
text.text: The base reward for bale wrapping contracts. If set to '-', the base game rewards will be applied.

text.name: cb_treeTransportMissionReward_long
text.text: The base reward for transporting trees. If set to '-', the base game rewards will be applied.
